issue.title: [R] test-r-ubuntu-21.04 nightly build failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14841](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14841). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
e.g. https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/branches/all?query=nightly-2021-11-24-0-github-test-r-ubuntu-21.04 

might have something more systematic, but at least some of the failures I’m seeing is in the r dependency building process. RSPM doesn’t support 21.04, so we build all those dependencies from scratch, and we keep on having the process killed. We might try turning off particularly long-running dependencies (if they are in suggests) like duckdb
